info.name: New ETF2L
info.description: Revamped style for European Team Fortress 2 League website. Tested with Chrome and Firefox for Windows 7.
info.additionalInfo: NOTE ABOUT INSTALLATION Because importing Google Web Fonts is not allowed on userstyles.org, you have to edit CSS manually and add these lines in the beginning: @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat); @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400italic,600italic,700italic,400,600,700);
